did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Rome Cheese Manufacturing Association collection, 1863-1951.
did.physdesc: Articles of incorporation, a stock certificate, accounts, minutes, reports, programs, periodicals, newspaper clippings, a bibliography, and other papers.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes a typescript copy of the articles of incorporation (March 1863) of the Association, which succeeded the operation begun by Jesse Williams in 1851; a stock certificate and receipt for a stock subscription payment (2 35 mm. slides, 1863); photostats (1868-1888) of David Williams' accounts with the Rome Cheese Manufacturing Association for making and boxing cheeses, minutes of stockholders' meetings, and treasurer's reports; also programs, periodicals, newspaper clippings, and a bibliography concerning cheese manufacturing, the R.C.M.A. and the Cheese Centennial held in 1951.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes a typescript copy of the articles of incorporation (March 1863) of the Association, which succeeded the operation begun by Jesse Williams in 1851; a stock certificate and receipt for a stock subscription payment (2 35 mm. slides, 1863); photostats (1868-1888) of David Williams' accounts with the Rome Cheese Manufacturing Association for making and boxing cheeses, minutes of stockholders' meetings, and treasurer's reports; also programs, periodicals, newspaper clippings, and a bibliography concerning cheese manufacturing, the R.C.M.A. and the Cheese Centennial held in 1951.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Rome Cheese Manufacturing Association collection, #2101. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: David Williams in account with Rome Cheese Co.
July 1868 - boxing cheese, "hogs to whey," etc.
May-Dec. 1870 - boxing cheese, making, cutting; whey; rennets, lumber, coal, "bandages."

Stockholders of R.C. Mfging Assoc. met on Jan. 12, 1875 and organized trustees appointed - officers elected - notation on reverse side of piece re: withholding report from public, 1877 (penciled copy?).
Treasurer's Reports
July 1885 .
Aug. 1887 - amount of milk required for a pound of cheese is noted.
Bibliography on cheese mfg. (carbon copy).
Program for America's Cheese Centennial, 1851- 1951 (three copies).
Newspaper clippings from Rome Daily Sentinel re: Rome cheese mfg. and centennial, 1922, 1935, 1951 (15 pieces).
Two issues of The Kraftsman, May-June 1951 and June-July 1951 .
Menlo Park and Edison Institute Museum and Village, Apr. 1961 (unrelated pamphlets).
Two 35 mm. slides of the following cheese factory items, originals of which are in Rome Historical Society--Fort Stanwix Museum:
R.C.M.A. stock certificate, Mar. 1863.
Receipt for sum paid on stock subscription; signed by Jesse Williams, Treasurer.
Typescript carbon copy of articles of association of R.C.M.A., Mar. 23, 1863 .
Photostatic copies (36 pcs.) of the two lead stories on the Williams Cheese Factory, appearing in the Rome Daily Sentinel of June 1, 1951 .

Second Annual Report of the New York State Cheese Manufacturer's Association, with Accompanying Papers, &c., for the Year 1864. Utica, N.Y.: Roberts, 1865 . 171 pp. pamphlet (originally in: A.D. White Papers, #1-2-2, Box 241).
